## Bio

I am a PhD student in the Department of Electrical and Software Engineering at the **University of Calgary**, advised by **Prof. Samira Ebrahimi Kahou**. I received my **M.S. in Computer Science** from the **University of Southern California**.

My research focuses on **Machine Learning Interpretability** and **Large Language Models (LLMs)**. I am interested in deciphering the internal mechanisms of transformers to improve model transparency.

Previously, I was a Software Engineer at **Salesforce** and a Researcher at **Harvard University**.

## News

* **Dec 2025:** Submitted our paper *"Cross-Layer Discrete Concept Discovery"* to TMLR.
